1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zaid bin Arqam said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'These Hushush (waste areas) are visited (by devils), so when anyone of you enters, let him say: 'Allahumma inni a`udhu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba'ith (O Allah, I seek refuge with You from male and female devils).'" (Sahih) Other chains with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا دَخَلَ الْخَلاَءَ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said when entering the toilet
